skill.name: prototype-to-production
skill.description: Convert design prototypes (HTML, CSS, Figma exports) into production-ready components. Analyzes prototype structure, extracts design tokens, identifies reusable patterns, and generates typed React components. Adapts to existing project tech stack with React + TypeScript as default.
skill.summary: Convert design prototypes (HTML, CSS, Figma exports) into production-ready components. Analyzes prot...
skill.author: ArieGoldkin

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based knowledge skill containing only documentation and code templates. No executable scripts, network calls, file system access, or code execution capabilities. All content is static reference material for converting HTML prototypes to React components.

content.value_statement: Transforming design prototypes into production code is time-consuming and error-prone. This skill provides a systematic workflow to analyze prototypes, extract design tokens, and generate type-safe React components that match your existing project conventions.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes HTML prototypes to identify component boundaries and structure
Extracts design tokens (colors, typography, spacing) from CSS styles
Detects project tech stack (React, Vue, Svelte, Angular) and TypeScript support
Generates typed React components with forwardRef pattern and accessibility
Applies atomic design methodology to decompose complex prototypes
Converts inline styles to Tailwind CSS or styled-component patterns
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly - provides guidance only
Does not connect to external APIs or fetch remote resources
Does not handle backend logic or database integration
Does not migrate state management (Redux, Context) from prototypes

use_cases.title: Productionize prototypes
use_cases.description: Convert HTML/CSS mockups into maintainable React components with proper typing

use_cases.title: Handoff to code
use_cases.description: Prepare Figma exports with clear component structure for developer implementation

use_cases.title: Rapid component creation
use_cases.description: Quickly build production UI from super-design iterations without manual conversion

prompt_templates.title: Basic conversion
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the prototype-to-production skill to convert this HTML prototype to a React TypeScript component. Extract design tokens and apply atomic design principles.

prompt_templates.title: Figma export
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the prototype-to-production skill to convert this Figma-exported HTML into production-ready React components. Include accessibility attributes.

prompt_templates.title: Design tokens
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the prototype-to-production skill to extract design tokens from the prototype CSS. Create a design-tokens.json file with colors, typography, and spacing.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-component
prompt_templates.prompt: Decompose this complex prototype into atomic components using the prototype-to-production workflow. Generate component-base.tsx and component-with-variants.tsx templates.

output_examples.input: Convert this HTML button prototype to a React component with TypeScript
output: Button component with variant and size props
Tailwind CSS classes extracted from inline styles
Design tokens for primary color extracted

best_practices: Always extract repeated patterns (2+ occurrences) into reusable components
Include accessibility attributes (aria-*, keyboard support) from the start
Extract design tokens before component generation for consistency
Match the generated code to your project naming conventions (PascalCase for components)
anti_patterns: Converting a clickable div instead of using semantic button elements
Skipping design token extraction leading to hardcoded values across components
Not considering responsive breakpoints from the prototype
Ignoring accessibility requirements in favor of visual-only implementation

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: React (default), Vue, Svelte, and Angular. Detects framework from package.json and generates appropriate component format.

faq.question: Does this skill work with Figma exports?
faq.answer: Yes. It detects Figma-specific class names (figma- prefix) and converts exported HTML to React components.

faq.question: How are design tokens extracted?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes inline styles and CSS classes to identify colors, typography, spacing, and border radius patterns.

faq.question: Is my code sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill with no network access. All processing happens within your AI context.

faq.question: Can I use this with Tailwind CSS?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill supports converting inline styles to Tailwind classes when Tailwind is detected in the project.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual conversion?
faq.answer: Provides systematic workflow, extracts consistent design tokens, and generates properly typed components following best practices.
